Interface MeterPoller

All Known Implementing Classes:
MndotPoller, NatchPoller
public interface MeterPoller
MeterPoller is an interface for pollers which can send messages to ramp meter devices.
Author:
Douglas Lau

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Field
